column1: * 1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien applies at the Oxford recruiting office to join the World War I.
* 1915 - Scholar and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien Przemyslaw Mroczkowski is born.
* 1919 - The Treaty of Versailles is signed and the First World War officially ends.
* 1981 - The seventeenth episode of The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2000 – The Tolkien Ensemble publish their second album
